title: Grandma's Apple Pie
description: Warm, flaky, and filled with sweet cinnamon apples.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and flour. Fill crust, cover with top crust. Bake for 50-60 mins until golden brown.

title: Classic Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, ricotta, meat sauce, and mozzarella.
instructions: Cook beef, boil noodles, layer with sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy with melty chocolate chips.
instructions: Cream butter and sugar, add eggs, then dry ingredients. Fold in chips. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.
